about.quienesHemosBuscado: Those of us who have looked for a new home know that there is little information beyond what the ads promise
about.homeReviewPermite: Reviu allows you to access the experiences of those who have already lived in the home you are looking for, and to share your own experiences about the places where you have lived.
about.yaNoNecesitas: There is no better advertisement than the experience of someone who has lived in that place.
about.entreTodosPodemos: Let's help each other to make house hunting a safe experience.
about.hagamosEncontrar: Let's turn finding a new home into an abuse-free experience.
about.informacionPoder: Information is power, let’s help each other make the best informed decision when it comes to renting a home.
about.imaginasEncontrarPiso: Do you like the sound of finding a home and being able to know the experience of someone who has actually lived there before? Being able to know what the neighbors and the area are like?
about.somosMasQueUnPortal: We want to turn the rental jungle into a safer space, helping you make informed decisions and distinguishing those who do things right.

addressReview.comparteExperiencia: Review the places where you have lived and share your experience anonymously.
addressReview.dejanosTuOpinion: Let us know what you think!
addressReview.NoPuedesPublicar: You cannot publish two reviews of the same home. To ensure that the ratings of each home are reliable, only one review per person is allowed
addressReview.yaTienesReview: You already have a review in this home
addressReview.revisaErrores: Check that there are no errors in the address you have written in the search engine
addressReview.noHayViviendas: There are no homes registered at this address
addressReview.baseDatosInmuebles: The real estate database is the land registry. If the home you are looking for does not appear, it may not be registered.
addressReview.formaCorrecta: Correct way of introducing the address
addressReview.reviewAuthenticityContent: By continuing to write a review, you agree that if it is reported as inaccurate or deceptive, we may request proof of your residence at the property, such as a rental agreement, to verify the its authenticity. If the required documentation is not provided, your review may be removed to maintain the integrity of our platform.
addressReview.reviewWarningContent: By leaving a review, you are agreeing that, if necessary, we may request evidence to verify its authenticity.

banner.changesRules: Find reviews of the apartment you are looking for

bannerOpinion.experienceAndShare: Re-live your experience and share it.
bannerOpinion.helpIdeal: Help others find their ideal home.

blog.findOutTips: Find out the most useful tips
blog.gotIdeas: Missing any tips? Contact us and tell us what you'd like to know!

conditions.descripcionP1: Reviu Casa makes available to the Users the Website, through which the Users will be able to share and find opinions about the apartments in their cities so that the Users can acquire additional and personal information to choose a home. Thanks to the Website, Users may have access to the information shared by other Users who have previously lived in such homes, from which, they may get a more concrete idea about it, including information about its facilities, the environment, the location or even their general experiences during the period in which the Users were living in them.
conditions.cuentaUsuarioP1: Access to the Website is completely free for Users, although, in order to have access to some of the additional functionalities (such as being able to give their opinion on an apartment), the User must register on the Website by creating their own account. The creation of such an account is optional but will be necessary in order to be able to actively participate in the community created through the Website.
conditions.cuentaUsuarioP2: In order to create an Account on the Website, the User must be of legal age and have the legal capacity to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. The registration to the Webaite will be considered completed once the User has received an email of account creation.
conditions.cuentaUsuarioP3: It is the sole responsibility of the User to ensure the confidentiality of the access password and the security of his/her account, and must communicate to Reviu Casa any suspicion of loss, theft or compromise of the security of his/her account or password access. The User shall be solely responsible for all access and use of the Webaite that is made from his/her user account by any person using the account, regardless of whether access and use of your account are authorized by the User. The user account is personal, unique and non-transferable, in case of detecting multiple accounts with matching data, you may cancel, suspend or disable them.
conditions.cuentaUsuarioP4: The User assures that the information provided for registration is true, faithful, accurate and complete and undertakes to update the information when it is incorrect or incomplete. In the event that the User provides incorrect or outdated information, Reviu Casa reserves the right to cancel the User's registration immediately.
conditions.cuentaUsuarioP5: The fact of completing all the steps and providing the corresponding consent or acceptance implies the express acceptance of these Terms and Conditions by the User or, if applicable, by the parent or legal guardian of the minor User, having the same validity as the express signature of a contract.

cookies.title: COOKIES POLICY
cookies.ownershipAndUsage2: ') is the owner of the Web Site reviucasa.com (hereinafter the '
cookies.ownershipAndUsage3: ') and uses cookies that collect information related to the connection, browsers and devices used by Internet users who access and use the Web Site (hereinafter the '
cookies.ownershipAndUsage4: '). Reviu Casa uses this information to manage and improve the proper functioning of the Website.
cookies.ownershipAndUsage5: This policy describes what information these cookies collect, how they are used and for what purpose. It also indicates how the User can restrict or block the automatic downloading of cookies, however, this could reduce or even hinder certain elements of the functionality of the Website. Likewise, the User can choose the category of cookies that he/she wishes to activate in the cookies banner that appears the first time he/she accesses the Website.
cookies.cookieDefinition1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on the User's computer, smartphone or other device when accessing the Internet. This is done to improve the User's experience and for other purposes, such as recognizing Users when accessing the Site, ensuring the security of your account and delivering targeted advertising.
cookies.cookieDefinition2: For more general information about cookies, please see the following
cookies.howWeUseCookies1: In summary, Reviu Casa uses the cookies listed in Annex I of this Policy to track how the Website is used in order to optimize its operation.
cookies.typesOfCookiesUsed1: The Web Site uses both its own and third-party cookies:
cookies.firstPartyCookiesDesc: : cookies sent to your device by Reviu Casa through the web domain.
cookies.thirdPartyCookiesDesc: : these are sent to your device by domains that are not managed by Reviu Casa but by another entity that processes the data collected through cookies.
cookies.typesOfCookiesUsed2: According to the purpose of the cookies, the cookies used by Reviu Casa can be divided into the following categories:
cookies.technicalCookiesDesc: : cookies necessary for navigation and for the proper functioning of the Website. Their use allows basic functions, such as access, secure navigation. The legal basis that allows the collection of data through these cookies is the legitimate interest of Reviu Casa in the management of the Website. No information collected through these cookies is shared with third parties. See the cookie table below for details of these cookies.
cookies.preferenceCookiesDesc: : these are cookies that are installed in order to customize the User's experience (that is, the way in which certain windows will appear or not in the User's navigation) according to the consents and preferences that, where appropriate, the User expresses while browsing the Website, such as control over the acceptance of this Cookies Policy by the User (this will mean that the cookie warning banner will no longer appear, with its corresponding acceptance or not, for the User). As in the case of analytical cookies, the legitimate basis that allows us to collect such data from the User through these preference cookies is the consent of the User.
cookies.typesOfCookiesUsed3: You can find the detailed list of the cookies we use, the type, purpose and duration of each one of them in the table of cookies below (Annex I).
cookies.howToDisableCookies1: The User may restrict or limit the placement of cookies by adjusting the settings of your browser. However, if you select this setting, you may not be able to access certain parts of the Website or the poor display of its contents, which will result in less efficient browsing and you may not be able to take advantage of some of the services available. Therefore, it is recommended that you do not disable them.
cookies.howToDisableCookies2: If you wish to disable cookies, go to the Browser Preferences menu or Browser settings and look for the Privacy section. As an example, you can follow the instructions below:
cookies.moreInfo1: We hope we have clarified how and why we use cookies. If anything is still unclear, please do not hesitate to contact us at:

experiences.shareAndFind: Share and find reviews about homes in your city.
experiences.shareExperiences: Share your experiences to help others
experiences.shareAndHelp: Find out what it's like to live there before you move in.

faq.answerWhat: Those of us who have looked for a new home know that there is little information beyond what the ads promise. Reviu allows you to discover what it’s like to live in the home you are interested in beforemoving in, and to share opinions about the places where you have lived. Through information sharing, we want to turn the jungle of renting into a fairer and safer space, highlighting those who do things right.
faq.answerReview: By sharing your experiences about the homes you have lived in, you increase the chances that you or anyone else can find out the truth about the home you are looking for as well as about the neighbors, the building, and the area you want to live in.
faq.answerAnonymous: All reviews are completely anonymous. Reviu will never share your personal information. We will also guarantee the anonymity of the owner of the home you are reviewing, if they are a private individual. You can read more details in our privacy policy. If you have any questions, please write to info@reviucasa.com
faq.landlordReview: Will my landlord see my review?
faq.answerLandlord: The reviews are anonymous and the dates of stay are approximate, so no one will know who wrote them. But it is possible that your landlord will read your review and we welcome that because Reviu wants to encourage and recognize good practices. But if you are concerned, make sure you don't share any information that could identify you.
faq.realEstate: Why can't I find the home I'm looking for?
faq.answerRealEstate: If the home you are looking for is not in Reviu, it is because those who have lived in it have not yet left a review. But you might still be able to  read  reviews of the building and the neighbourhood to have  a useful overview of the area. The Reviu platform will work better the more we all share opinions of the homes we have lived in. Encourage your friends and family to leave a review!
faq.otherCitiesExist: Does Reviu exist in other cities?
faq.otherCitiesAnswer: Reviu exists only  in Barcelona, for now. Do you want Reviu in your city?
faq.answerHowToVerify: We want Reviu to provide quality and reliable content, but it is the users’ responsibility to make good use of the portal. Reviews including spam or inappropriate language, harassment, discrimination or hate speech are not welcome. Anyone can report them.
faq.canIParticipate: Can I participate if I am a real estate agent or landlord?
faq.answerCanIParticipate: In the initial version of Reviu, only those who live or have lived in the homes can participate. In the future, the portal will incorporate a new functionality allowing landlords and real estate agents to participate as well. If you want to get in touch, write us at info@reviucasa.com

legalNotice.enlacesP1: The Website may contain links to other websites in order to complement the services offered to the user. Reviu Casa is not the owner of these web pages, so it is not responsible for their contents or for any damages that the use of them may cause to the User.
legalNotice.enlacesP2: If the User of the Web Site accesses such web pages and the services they offer, Reviu Casa will remain outside any kind of relationship that could be established between the user and the owners of such web pages or any third parties related to them.
legalNotice.enlacesP3: Likewise, the owner of a web page in which it intends to insert a link to the Website must obtain prior authorization from Reviu Casa.
legalNotice.enlacesP4: Reviu Casa shall not be responsible for the contents of those web pages in which there is a link to the Web Site and shall remain outside the relationships that may be established between the owners of such web pages and the Users of the Web Site.
legalNotice.modificacionesP1: Reviu Casa reserves the right to modify this Legal Notice at any time. Changes or updates to the Legal Notice, as well as the
legalNotice.modificacionesP7: will be explicitly notified to the User through a notice on the Website.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.privacidadP4: is the owner of the website reviucasa.com (hereinafter the 'Website') and is responsible for the processing of personal data of its users (hereinafter the 'Users').
privacy.privacidadP5: Through this Privacy Policy, and in compliance with Articles 12 and 13 of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (hereinafter 'GDPR') and Article 11 of the Organic Law 3/2018, of December 5, on the Protection of Personal Data and guarantee of digital rights ('LOPDPGDD'), Reviu Casa informs Users using the Website about the processing of their personal data that may be collected through this and processed by Reviu Casa.
privacy.conservación: 2. Data processed, legal bases, purposes and retention period.
privacy.conservacionTD1: Due to Internet communication standards, when the User accesses our Web Site we automatically receive the IP address of your computer and the type of browser you are using. We use this information to analyze general trends and improve the service. This information is not shared with third parties without your consent.
privacy.conservacionTD3: Analysis of browsing behavior and statistics. The information collected through cookies and other similar tracking technologies allows us to analyze the browsing behavior of Users.
privacy.conservacionTD4: Retention periods depend on each specific cookie. For more information on retention periods, please refer to Cookie Policy.
privacy.conservacionTD5: The User can contact Reviu Casa by e-mail. The data processed are Email, and message content.
privacy.conservacionT7: To attend and respond to requests, comments, suggestions. As well as providing support to the User during the use of the Website.
privacy.conservacionTD8: Personal data will be processed by Reviu Casa for the period necessary to answer the question and/or solve the incident indicated by the User. Such data will be blocked to comply with the legal obligations of Reviu Casa and, after that period, will be definitively deleted.
privacy.conservacionTD9: First name, last name, email, user name.
privacy.conservacionTD10: Execution of the contractual relationship to which the User is a party.
privacy.conservacionT11: These data will be processed in order to create an account for the User and to be able to use all the functionalities of the Website, without them, it is not possible to create a user account. The User is responsible for the accuracy of the data provided, Reviu Casa reserves the right to exclude from the services to any user who has provided false or inaccurate data, without prejudice to other remedies available.
privacy.conservacionTD12: For as long as the user keeps his account active on the Website and, once it has been deactivated, Reviu Casa will keep the personal data (blocked) of the Users for the time necessary to comply with legal obligations.
privacy.conservacionTD13: During the use of the Website, the User may post comments that may incorporate personal data.
privacy.conservacionT15: These data will be processed in order to fulfill the main purpose of the Website, based on providing Users with a space in which to share experiences and/or opinions about real estate.
privacy.conservacionTD16: For the duration of the User consent and after its withdrawal, Reviu Casa will retain the personal data (blocked) of the Users for the time necessary to comply with legal obligations.
privacy.destinatarios: 3. To which recipients will your data be communicated?
privacy.destinatariosP1: Reviu Casa informs that, for the fulfillment of the purposes described above, it will not transfer the User's personal data to third parties. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Reviu Casa may give access to such personal data to:
privacy.destinatariosL1: Technology service providers with which it has entered into a processor contract; in particular to:
privacy.destinatariosL2: Database maintenance and newsletter subscription management service providers.
privacy.destinatariosL6: Consent Management Platform Providers (Consent Management Platform)
privacy.destinatariosP2: The aforementioned providers may be located in jurisdictions that generally do not provide adequate safeguards in relation to the processing of personal data. For all entities that are not part of the European Economic Area (EEA), Reviu Casa has entered into contracts with such entities that include such safeguards, including the European Commission's model clauses.
privacy.destinatariosP3: Users may obtain more information about technology service providers by requesting the same from Reviu Casa through the means of contact provided in this privacy policy.
privacy.destinatariosP4: Also, Reviu Casa may communicate your data to:
privacy.destinatariosL8: Other companies that are part of the Reviu Casa
privacy.destinatariosL9: Companies interested in buying or acquiring the company or a part of its business and, consequently, give access to any national or international auditor to carry out their due diligence.
privacy.destinatariosP5: Finally, the User will be able to participate through the Web Site by publishing his/her opinions about the properties, which will be shared with all the Users of the Web Site.
privacy.destinatariosL10: Authorities to investigate suspected fraud, harassment or other violations of any law, rule or regulation, or of the website policies.
privacy.seguridadP1: Reviu Casa undertakes to adopt the necessary technical and organizational measures, in accordance with the provisions of the applicable regulations, to ensure the security of personal data and prevent the accidental or unlawful destruction, loss or alteration of personal data transmitted, stored or otherwise processed, or unauthorized communication or access to such data. Personal data will be treated confidentially by Reviu Casa, which undertakes to inform and enforce, by legal or contractual obligation, such confidentiality to its employees, partners and any person who should have access to the User's personal data.
privacy.derechosP1: The User may exercise the rights of access, rectification, deletion, opposition and, where appropriate, limitation of processing and portability of data by sending an email to
privacy.derechosP2: Likewise, the User may file a complaint with a supervisory authority and, in particular, with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (
privacy.derechosP3: ) if he/she considers that the rights set forth above in this Privacy Policy have been violated or if he/she considers that the processing of personal data concerning him/her violates the applicable regulations.
privacy.cambiosPoliticaP1: Reviu Casa reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes or updates to the Privacy Policy will be explicitly notified to the User by means of a notice on the Website, together with the updated version of the Privacy Policy.

suspended.title: Your Account Has Been Suspended
suspended.whySectionStart: We have sent you an email detailing the reasons for the suspension of your account. Below are the most common reasons for account suspensions:
suspended.whySection1: Engagement in hate speech or discriminatory behavior.
suspended.whySection2: Posting of fake reviews or misleading information.
suspended.whySection3: Repeated posting of unwanted or repetitive content to disrupt the user experience.
suspended.whySection4: Maliciously reporting content or other users without just cause.
suspended.whySection5: Posing as another individual or organization to deceive users.
suspended.whySection6: Encouraging or facilitating illegal activities through the platform.
suspended.whySection7: Unauthorized sharing or publication of private information.
suspended.whySectionEnd: While your account is suspended, you will not be able to access certain features and pages of our platform. Please note that unless the decision is overturned, all data associated with your account will be permanently deleted within 30 days.
suspended.mistakeSection1: Our decisions to suspend accounts involve careful review and are supported by a combination of AI tools and human oversight. If you believe your account was wrongly suspended, or if there are extenuating circumstances we should consider, please contact us directly at
suspended.mistakeSection2: We are committed to ensuring fairness and will review your case as quickly as possible.
